text: Va nest kase zolimtar az onon, ki jod kardani nomi Allohro dar masçidho az ʙarpo doştani namoz va tilovati Qur'on va monandi on man' mekunand va dar vajronii onho mekūşand. In gurūh zolimonro sazovor ast, ki harosonu tarson ʙa masçidho darojand. Onhoro dar dunjo xorī va dar oxirat azoʙi ʙuzurgest
